table.name: ship_group
table.description: Shipment group. Created to group together shipments.

columns.name: SHIP_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the shipment group.

columns.name: SHIP_GROUP_XID
columns.description: The XID for the shipment group.

columns.name: SHIP_GROUP_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the shipment group type.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location of the shipment group.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location of the shipment group.

columns.name: SHIP_GROUP_RULE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the rule by which the shipment group is created.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: Indicates the start time of the shipment group.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: Indicates the end time of the shipment group.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: A settable indicator for the shipment group.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: Indicates the equipment group ID for trailer build.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: Total weight of all the shipments in the shipment group

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the total weight.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Total weight of the shipment group in base unit.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: Total volume of all the shipments in the shipment group.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the total volume.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Total volume of the shipment group in base unit.

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_SHIPMENTS
columns.description: Total number of shipments in the shipment group

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The service provider for the trailer build. If the shipment group was created from a rule, the service provider will be copied to the shipment group matched from the rule.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the shipment group.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the shipment group.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the shipment group.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the shipment group.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: Can store a user-defined icon that will appear within the user interface to help visually identify attributes of the shipment group.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_PRIORITY_GID
columns.description: shipment group appointment priority used for dock scheduling priority feature

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A boolean field.  When it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: VOYAGE_GID
columns.description: The Voyage ID with which the shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Match Schedule as true.

columns.name: PORT_OF_LOAD_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Port of loading ID with which shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Match Port of loading as true.

columns.name: PORT_OF_DIS_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Port of discharge ID with which the shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Match Port of discharge as true.

columns.name: S_EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The Equipment ID with which the shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Same Equipment as true.

columns.name: OR_SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Source Location ID with which the shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Same Order Source as true.

columns.name: OR_DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The Destination Location ID with which shipment group was created using a shipment group rule having Same Order Destination as true.
